original_text: Then the leaders were very angry with him. They shouted at him, ‘No, it is you! You are that man's disciple. But we are disciples of Moses.
korean_text: 그들이 욕하여 이르되 너는 그의 제자이나 우리는 모세의 제자라

sentences.original_text: Then the leaders were very angry with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 지도자들이 그에게 매우 화가 났다

sentences.original_text: But we are disciples of Moses
